visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data with a custom color scheme. Additionally, configure the chart with a white background, a legend, and specific margins.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart is styled with specific colors and font sizes for the title, axes, and labels. The x-axis represents the months of the year, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly temperature data with a custom color. The chart has a white background and specific margins to ensure readability. Additionally, a legend is enabled to provide context for the data series.
